archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0051
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product manager, I want 'pick up in store' orders to be fulfilled immediately after successful payment, so the customer can quickly collect their order in store

properties.value: OOTB Is there anything special related to this BUC? What does immediately mean? Customer first orders in Digital Sales/Self Care, selects plan, etc. Then he selects a store and goes there to collect the sim card. Payment online, not in store. Details to be discussed on a separate workshop

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
